statements: SELECT * FROM budget_tool_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category, expense FROM budget_tool_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, expense, category FROM budget_tool_data WHERE expense > 1000;
SELECT * FROM budget_tool_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(expense) AS total_expense FROM budget_tool_data GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM budget_tool_data WHERE category='Groceries';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_expenses FROM budget_tool_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_expenses > 5;
SELECT MIN(expense) AS min_expense, MAX(expense) AS max_expense FROM budget_tool_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT category, SUM(expense) AS total_expenses FROM budget_tool_data GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_tool_data WHERE expense BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE category='Groceries';
SELECT category_name, budget_limit FROM categories WHERE budget_limit > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries' AND amount > 50 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY category HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT category_name, budget_limit, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM categories LEFT JOIN transactions ON categories.category_name = transactions.category GROUP BY category_name, budget_limit ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount, category FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT category_name, budget_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE budget_limit > 1000;
SELECT expense_description, amount FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT expense_description, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT users.username, expenses.expense_description, expenses.amount FROM users JOIN expenses ON users.user_id = expenses.user_id WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT * FROM budget_categories WHERE budget_limit >= 500 ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM expenses;
SELECT category, amount, date FROM expenses;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, category, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, category, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT e.id, e.category, e.amount, u.username FROM expenses e JOIN users u ON e.id = u.id;
SELECT c.name, SUM(b.amount) AS total_budget FROM budgets b JOIN categories c ON b.category_id = c.id GROUP BY c.name HAVING total_budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE id = 2;
SELECT user_id, category_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM goals WHERE achieved = FALSE AND user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT t.id, u.username, c.category_name, t.amount, t.date FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.id JOIN categories c ON t.category_id = c.id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.date DESC;
SELECT user_id, category_id, AVG(budget_amount) AS average_budget FROM budgets GROUP BY user_id, category_id HAVING average_budget > 500;
